item.title: 美国股票基金连续第六周遭遇资金外流
item.description: 截至 6 月 25 日，美国股票基金连续第六周遭遇资金外流，原因是投资者在接近历史高点时获利了结，并在关键的经济增长和通胀数据公布前保持观望。【原文：U.S. equity funds suffered outflows for a sixth straight week through June 25 as investors took profits near record highs and stayed on edge ahead of key growth and inflation data.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利预计今年将降息两次，并可能暂停降息
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）坚持他的观点，即通胀降温将允许这家全球最重要的主要央行从今年 9 月开始两次下调政策利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari is sticking to his view that cooling inflation will allow the world's most important major central bank to cut its policy rate twice this year, starting in September.】

item.title: 全球股票基金连续第二周出现资金外流
item.description: 在截至6月25日的七天里，全球股票基金连续第二周出现资金外流，原因是投资者在市场创纪录高点附近获利了结，并在关键的美国经济产出和通胀报告公布前转为谨慎。【原文：Global equity funds saw money outflows for a second straight week in the seven days to June 25 as investors booked profits near record market highs and turned cautious ahead of key U.S. economic output and inflation reports.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国时装零售商申银万国将罕见地秘密申请在香港上市
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，在中国创办的快速时尚零售商申银万国计划以保密方式提交香港上市招股说明书草案，这与公司公开提交首次公开募股文件的惯例大相径庭。【原文：China-founded fast-fashion retailer Shein plans to file a draft prospectus confidentially for its Hong Kong listing, marking a rare departure from the usual practice of companies making public filings of IPO documents, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美元问题盘旋在辛特拉顶级央行行长会议上空
item.description: 下周，世界顶级央行行长将在葡萄牙辛特拉举行会议，届时，一个百万美元的问题将笼罩在他们的心头：以美国货币为中心的货币体系是否开始瓦解？【原文：A million-dollar question will hang over the world's top central bankers when they meet in Sintra, Portugal, next week: Is the monetary system centred on the U.S. currency beginning to unravel?】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普计划颁布行政命令，在与中国的竞争中推动人工智能发展
item.description: 据四位熟悉规划的消息人士透露，特朗普政府正在准备一揽子行政措施，旨在促进能源供应，为美国人工智能的扩张提供动力。【原文：The Trump administration is readying a package of executive actions aimed at boosting energy supply to power the U.S. expansion of artificial intelligence, according to four sources familiar with the planning.】

item.title: 暴力扼杀经济增长，犯罪每年给智利造成 80 亿美元损失
item.description: 一个多世纪以来，圣地亚哥市中心的 La Piojera 一直是一家热闹非凡的酒吧，以典型的智利美食、饮料和音乐吸引着当地人和游客。【原文：La Piojera in downtown Santiago has been a lively bar for over a century, drawing locals and tourists with typical Chilean foods, drinks and music, but now its doors are shutting earlier and sales are plummeting as rising crime has strangled the country and the economy.】

item.title: 早间竞价华尔街与新纪录擦肩而过
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 中国吉利任命欧洲业务新主席，接替创始人李书福
item.description: 中国吉利控股公司（GEELY.UL）是沃尔沃汽车、莲花汽车和其他汽车品牌的主要所有者，该公司周四晚些时候表示，已在其重要的欧洲投资公司任命了一位新的董事会主席，接替创始人李书福。【原文：China's Geely Holding (GEELY.UL), the main owner of Volvo Cars , Lotus and other auto brands, has appointed a new board chair at its key European investment company to replace founder Eric Li, it said late on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道北京将白兰地交易与欧洲电动汽车关税谈判联系起来
item.description: 中国是世界上最有价值的干邑市场，但干邑在中国的销售却出现萎缩。【原文：Sales of cognac in China, the world's most valuable market for the spirit, have shrunk.】

item.title: 美国最高法院准备对得克萨斯州网络色情年龄检查的挑战作出裁决
item.description: 美国最高法院预计将于周五就以言论自由为由对德克萨斯州一项要求色情网站核实用户年龄的法律提出的质疑做出裁决，该案将检验各州为防止未成年人在网上浏览此类材料所做努力的合法性。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court is expected to rule on Friday in a challenge on free speech grounds to a Texas law that requires pornographic websites to verify the age of users in a case testing the legality of state efforts to keep minors from viewing such material online.】

item.title: 洞察力：受高价刺激，美国人自制减肥药
item.description: 在被她称为肥胖症药物的 "狂野西部"，来自密苏里州的艾米-斯宾塞（Amy Spencer）是一位先驱。【原文：In what she calls the "wild west" of obesity medicines, Missouri-based Amy Spencer is a pioneer.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布前降息希望升温，美股期货上涨
item.description: 美国股指期货周五攀升，使标准普尔500指数和纳斯达克指数有望创下历史新高，因为投资者在等待一项关键的通胀数据，同时对美联储今年将采取鸽派货币政策的预期日益增强。【原文：U.S. stock index futures climbed on Friday, putting the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq on track for record highs, as investors awaited a key inflation reading amid growing expectations of a dovish monetary policy from the Federal Reserve this year.】

item.title: 伊朗黑客在以色列和美国打击后保持低调
item.description: 在以色列和美国军队打击伊朗核目标之后，两国官员都对伊斯兰共和国黑客可能实施的破坏性网络攻击敲响了警钟。【原文：After Israeli and American forces struck Iranian nuclear targets, officials in both countries sounded the alarm over potentially disruptive cyberattacks carried out by the Islamic Republic’s hackers.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 就业数据、贸易和财政政策成焦点，标普 500 指数濒临创纪录水平
item.description: 被近期地缘政治事件所吸引的投资者准备在未来一周将注意力转移到关键的经济数据和迫在眉睫的政策期限上，看看美股的狂热涨势是否会继续走高。【原文：Investors who have been captivated by recent geopolitical events are poised to shift their attention in the coming week to key economic data and looming policy deadlines to see if the torrid rally in U.S. stocks extends higher.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势减弱，瑞银上调标普 500 指数年度目标
item.description: 瑞银全球财富管理公司（UBS Global Wealth Management）将 S&P 500 指数的年终目标从之前预测的 6,000 点上调至 6,200 点，原因是贸易不确定性有所缓和。【原文：UBS Global Wealth Management raised its year-end target for the S&P 500 index to 6,200 from its prior forecast of 6,000, banking on softening trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 独家报道：Meta 称欧盟反垄断监管机构歧视其商业模式
item.description: Meta Platforms 周五批评欧盟反垄断监管机构在美国公司寻求遵守针对其 "付费或同意 "商业模式的命令时移动目标。【原文：Meta Platforms on Friday criticised EU antitrust regulators for moving the goalpost as the U.S. company seeks to comply with an order targeting its pay-or-consent business model.】

item.title: DeepSeek 在德国面临被应用商店驱逐的命运
item.description: 德国数据保护机构专员周五发表声明称，出于对数据保护的担忧，德国已采取措施禁止中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 进入苹果和谷歌应用商店。【原文：Germany has taken steps towards blocking Chinese AI startup DeepSeek from the Apple and Google app stores due to concerns about data protection, according to a data protection authority commissioner in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 局外人与老将：谁将领导泰国央行？
item.description: 一位是具有管理大型国有金融机构经验的前私营部门高管，一位是能够保持连续性的长期央行官员，他们正在角逐下一任泰国央行行长。【原文：A former private sector executive with experience of handling major state-owned financial institutions and a long-time central banker who could maintain continuity are in the race to become the next governor of the Bank of Thailand.】

item.title: 巴西提高生物燃料要求，玉米乙醇需求大增
item.description: 巴西政府要求在汽油中使用更多乙醇，根据这项新规定，巴西玉米乙醇行业的增长已成为满足该国日益增长的可再生燃料需求的关键，尽管以甘蔗为原料的乙醇产量已停滞不前。【原文：Growth of Brazil's corn ethanol sector has become key to meeting the country's growing demand for the renewable fuel under a new government mandate to use more ethanol in gasoline, even as sugarcane-based ethanol output has stagnated.】

item.title: 中国禁止未经认证和召回的移动电源上飞机
item.description: 中国航空监管机构将从周六起禁止乘客携带没有中国安全认证标志的电源箱，以及最近因安全问题被制造商召回的电源箱。【原文：China's aviation regulator will from Saturday ban passengers from carrying power banks without Chinese safety certification markings, as well as those recently recalled by manufacturers because of safety concerns.】

item.title: 比利时检察官启动洗钱调查后，Worldline 股价下跌
item.description: 在布鲁塞尔检察院表示已就洗钱指控对法国支付集团在比利时的实体展开调查后，Worldline 股价周五下跌达 9%。【原文：Worldline shares fell as much as 9% on Friday after the Brussels prosecutor office said it had opened an investigation into the Belgian entity of the French payments group over money laundering allegations.】

item.title: 独家报道欧盟称 Meta 将仅对 "付费或同意 "模式进行有限修改
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，Meta Platforms 将仅对其 2024 年 11 月推出的付费或同意模式进行有限的修改，欧盟反垄断监管机构暂时无法核实这些修改是否足以遵守欧盟的反垄断命令。【原文：Meta Platforms will only make limited changes to its pay-or-consent model rolled out in November 2024 and EU antitrust regulators cannot verify for now if the changes are sufficient to comply with an EU antitrust order, the European Commission said on Friday.】

item.title: 荷兰政府承诺出资 7000 万欧元建设人工智能工厂
item.description: 荷兰政府周五承诺出资 7000 万欧元（8203 万美元）在北部城市格罗宁根建造一家人工智能工厂。【原文：The Dutch government on Friday pledged 70 million euros ($82.03 million) for the construction of an AI factory in the northern city of Groningen.】

item.title: 中国的奢侈品体验：全球高端品牌押注概念店以重振销售
item.description: 路易威登（Louis Vuitton）在上海最新开设的专卖店并非一般的奢侈品旗舰店。这家名为 "路易威登号"（The Louis）的商店高 30 米，呈船形，位于上海市中心的南京路商业街，店内设有展览空间和咖啡厅，被称为 "一种体验"。【原文：Louis Vuitton's latest Shanghai store is not your average luxury flagship. The 30-meter-high, ship-shaped store, "The Louis", is billed as an experience, and houses an exhibition space and cafe in Shanghai's downtown Nanjing Road shopping strip.】

item.title: OVHcloud 与 Crayon 合作开发欧洲数据基础设施
item.description: 欧洲最大的数据中心提供商--法国OVHcloud公司与挪威云软件提供商Crayon公司合作开发欧洲主权数据基础设施，其硬件和软件组件均来自欧洲公司。【原文：France's OVHcloud , Europe's largest data centre provider, has partnered with Norway's cloud software provider Crayon to develop a sovereign European data infrastructure, with both hardware and software components originating from European companies.】

item.title: 耐克法兰克福业绩公布后股价上涨 9%，带动阿迪达斯和彪马股价上涨
item.description: 耐克公司周五在法兰克福股价上涨 9.2%，此前该公司预测第一季度收入降幅小于预期，并表示将减少对中国生产的依赖，以减轻关税对美国市场的影响。【原文：Nike shares rose 9.2% in Frankfurt on Friday, a day after the company forecast a smaller-than-expected drop in first-quarter revenue, and said it would cut its reliance on production in China for the U.S. market to mitigate the impact from tariffs】

item.title: NTT 已提交在新加坡交易所上市房地产投资信托基金的初步招股说明书
item.description: 据新加坡金融管理局网站周五公布的信息，日本电信电话公司（NTT）已在新加坡证券交易所提交了其数据中心房地产投资信托基金 NTT DC REIT 的初步首次公开募股说明书。【原文：Japan's Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp (NTT) has lodged a preliminary initial public offering prospectus for its data centre real estate investment trust NTT DC REIT on the Singapore stock exchange, according to information published on the Monetary Authority of Singapore's website on Friday.】

item.title: 研究人员建议欧洲央行改变通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲央行周五将在该行最重要的研究会议上向政策制定者提交一份文件，该文件认为，欧洲央行应放弃以总体通胀率为目标，转而关注可自由支配支出的价格增长，以保护该集团最贫穷的人。【原文：The ECB should abandon targeting headline inflation and focus instead on price growth in discretionary spending to protect the bloc's poorest, a paper to be presented to policymakers at the bank's preeminent research conference argued on Friday.】

item.title: 丰田全球销量创五月新高，但产量下降
item.description: 丰田汽车周五表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税，但由于美国等市场需求强劲，丰田汽车5月份的全球销量连续第五个月增长，创下当月最高纪录。【原文：Toyota Motor's global sales rose for a fifth straight month in May, setting a record for the month, as strong demand in markets such as the U.S. held firm despite President Donald Trump's tariffs, the automaker said on Friday.】
